meanings.sent1: I will audibilize the music so everyone can hear it clearly.
meanings.sent2: She audibilized the instructions for the students to follow.
meanings.sent3: The magician audibilized the rabbit's thoughts for the audience to hear.
meanings.sent4: His laughter audibilized the joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The wind audibilized the leaves rustling in the trees.

meanings.definition: To convert text into spoken words.
meanings.sent1: The software can audibilize the written story into an audio book.
meanings.sent2: They audibilized the document for the visually impaired student.
meanings.sent3: The robot audibilized the shopping list in a funny voice.
meanings.sent4: Her voice audibilized the emotions hidden in the text.
meanings.sent5: The actor's performance audibilized the character's dialogue on stage.
